resources.string: Welcome to the arcade, choose a game

This is a multiplayer game, with a maximum of two players. The goal is to get three in a row before your opponent does. If it is a tie, press the restart button on the bottom.
Player one has the X symbol, and player two has the O symbol.

Hangman is a classic, played on whiteboards everywhere. As a player your objective is to guess the right word that has been randomly selected. You guess the word one letter at a time, if the guess was correct, the letter will be displayed at a position on the screen corresponding to its position in the word. If you make an incorrect guess, a piece of the hangman structure will be drawn out. If all the hangman pieces have been drawn out before you figure out what the word is, you lose.

There are three difficulties, each difficulty has a different number of allowed incorrect guesses.
 Easy: 12 guesses
 Medium: 10 guesses
 Hard: 8 guesses

Memory will put your cognitive abilities to the test. This version comes with a dinosaur theme. As a player, your task is to turn over the cards one by one and find the matching cards. There are in total 16 cards made up of 8 duplicate cards.\n\n
For a correct guess, you get 4 points, and for an incorrect guess you get -1 point. The minimum points you are able to get is 0, and maximum is 32.
